name: Bush Simulator
description:
"Bush Simulator is the best game of 2022... It stands unrivaled" -me

"Interesting but has no real things to do but look around." -Playtester

"I think I felt sexually aroused by the trees movement" -Playtester 2

In this incredibly in depth game, you play a day in the life as a bush. Not only is there no day and night cycle, but theres ALSO unfixed visual bugs. You won't be able to put this best selling itch.io game down! 

(controls are mousepad/mouse, and alt f4 to close the game)
